description: Think About The Most Comfortable Bed&NbspYou'Ve Ever Slept In, And What Comes To Mind? If It'S The Sheets, You'Re In Good Company. Because They Come In Direct Contact With Our Skin, Sheets Are As Important As A Quality Mattress And Cozy Blanket In Sending Us Off To Dreamland.1) Material:Jaipur Cotex Bed Sheet Will Definitely Help You To Get Large Number Of Compliments. Crafted From Supreme&Nbsp &NbspQuality Cotton Material.2) Durability:Elegantly Designed, This Colourful&NbspJaipur Cotex  Bed Sheet With Pillow Covers Is Sure To Brighten Up Your Home Decor As It Has High Durability.3) Design:Impressive Designer&NbspBed Sheet&NbspTo Enhance Your Living.&NbspThe Stunning Design Of This Bed Sheet Further Makes Your Room Different In No Time. Moreover, The Unique Design And The Perfect Blend Of Colours Of This Bed Sheet Will Surely Catch Your Fancy In Just A Glance.4) Softness:This Jaipur Cotex  Bed Sheet Is Soft To Touch And Easy To Wash.5) Print:The Beautiful Print Enhances The Overall Appeal Of This Bed Sheet. Made From 100% Cotton, This Bed Sheet Is Soft Against The Skin.Instructions: Get The Product Dry-Cleaned For The First Time To Maintain The Vibrancy Of The Fabric, Regular Machine Or Hand Wash In Normal Or Luke Warm WaterDisclaimer :- Product Color May Slightly Vary Due To Photographic Lighting Sources Or Your Monitor Settings
